text: mēlum, allāh uṉakkuk koṭutta (celvat)tiliru; natu maṟumai vīṭṭaittēṭik koḷ; eṉiṉum, ivvulakattil uṉ nasīpai (uṉakku vitittiruppataiyum) maṟantu viṭātē! Allāh uṉakku nallataic ceytiruppataip pōl, nīyum nallatai cey! Iṉṉum, pūmiyil kuḻappam ceyya virumpātē niccayamāka allāh kuḻappam ceypavarkaḷai nēcippatillai" (eṉṟum kūṟiṉārkaḷ)
